---
id: get-business-accounts
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /business-accounts endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /business-accounts)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619348032/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Contas+-+v1.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client."

hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /business-accounts endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/open-data/v1/accounts/business-accounts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /business-accounts)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619348032/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Contas+-+v1.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["data","links","meta"],"properties":{"data":{"type":"array","minItems":1,"description":"Set of information related to the Accounts product.","items":{"type":"object","required":["participant","type","fees","openingClosingChannels","transactionMethods","termsConditions"],"properties":{"participant":{"type":"object","description":"Set of information relating to the Open Finance participant offering this product.","required":["brand","name","cnpjNumber"],"properties":{"brand":{"type":"string","maxLength":80,"pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","description":"Brand Name reported by Open Finance participant. The concept referred to by 'brand'  is essentially a promise by the company to provide a specific set of uniform attributes,  benefits and services to customers","example":"Organização A"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the Institution, belonging to the brand, responsible for the Loan modality. e.g. 'Empresa da Organização A'","maxLength":80,"pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","example":"Empresa A1"},"cnpjNumber":{"type":"string","pattern":"^\\d{14}$","minLength":14,"maxLength":14,"description":"CNPJ","example":"50685362000135"},"urlComplementaryList":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","maxLength":1024,"description":"URL of the link that will contain the complementary list with the names and CNPJs grouped  under the same cnpjNumber. The contents of this list have the same characteristics for products  and services. Electronic address for accessing the channel. It must be filled in if there is a  complementary list with the names and CNPJs to be made available.\nRestriction: It must be filled out if there is a complementary list with names and CNPJs to be made available.","example":"https://empresadaorganizacaoa.com/complementarylist"}}},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["CONTA_DEPOSITO_A_VISTA","CONTA_POUPANCA","CONTA_PAGAMENTO_PRE_PAGA"],"description":"Types of accounts offered to individuals or legal entities, e.g. 'CONTA_DEPOSITO_A_VISTA'.\nCONTA_DEPOSITO_A_VISTA - This is the most common type. In this account, the money is available  for withdrawal at any time. This account does not generate income for the depositor.\nConta CONTA_POUPANCA - was created to encourage people to save. Money that remains in the account  for thirty days starts to generate income, with exemption from income tax for those who declare it.  In other words, the money “grows” (earns income) while it is kept in the account. Each deposit will  have income from month to month, always on the day of the month in which the money was deposited.\nCONTA_PAGAMENTO_PRE_PAGA: according to CIRCULAR Nº 3.680, BCB of 2013, it is 'intended for the  execution of payment transactions in electronic currency carried out based on funds denominated in  reais previously contributed'","example":"CONTA_DEPOSITO_A_VISTA","title":"OpenDataAccountType"},"fees":{"type":"object","description":"Object that gathers information on service rates.","required":["services"],"properties":{"services":{"type":"array","maxItems":200,"items":{"type":"object","required":["name","code","chargingTriggerInfo","prices","minimum","maximum"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","maxLength":250,"pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","description":"Name of the Service that applies to the type of account selected for legal entities (Open Field)","example":"Evento personalizado"},"code":{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","description":"Identification acronym for Other Services that affect the types of accounts reported.","example":"EVENTO_PERSONALIZADO"},"chargingTriggerInfo":{"type":"string","maxLength":2000,"pattern":"^(?!\\s)[\\w\\W\\s]*[^\\s]$","description":"Chargeable facts that affect services that make up the Service Package.","example":"Cobrança devido a evento personalizado"},"prices":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["interval","value","currency","customers"],"properties":{"interval":{"type":"string","enum":["1_FAIXA","2_FAIXA","3_FAIXA","4_FAIXA"],"description":"According to Normative No. 32, BCB, of 2020: Distribution of relative frequency of the values  of tariffs charged to customers, as referred to in § 2 of art. 3 of Circular No. 4.015, of 2020,  must be based on four bands of equal size, with explanation of the values over the median in each  of these bands. This value,  considering that the currency is BRL, means R$ 1,547,368.92. The only separator present must be  the '.' (period) to indicate the decimal place. There must be no thousands separator). Note:  For the purpose of comparing product rates, participating institutions, when they do not charge  fees, must send the value 0.00 indicating that there is no charge for that rate for the service.","example":"2000.00"},"currency":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(\\w{3}){1}$","minLength":3,"maxLength":3,"description":"Currency corresponding to the minimum value of the Tariff, according to the ISO-4217 model","example":"BRL","title":"OpenDataCurrency"},"customers":{"type":"object","description":"Informações relevantes para o cliente.","required":["rate"],"properties":{"rate":{"type":"string","description":"Percentage of customers in each range.","pattern":"^\\d{1}\\.\\d{6}$","example":"0.150000","minLength":8,"maxLength":8}},"title":"Customer"}},"title":"Price"},"minItems":4,"maxItems":4,"description":"Service tariff price distribution list"},"minimum":{"type":"object","required":["value","currency"],"properties":{"value":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(\\d{1,9}\\.\\d{2}){1}$","minLength":4,"maxLength":12,"description":"Minimum value determined for the service fee on the customer base in the reference month. Restriction - Required when not the last page of the response.","maxLength":2000,"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)?(www\\.)?[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#=]{2,256}\\.[a-z]{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\\+.~#?&\\/\\/=]*)$","type":"string","example":"https://api.banco.com.br/open-banking/api/v1/resource"},"last":{"format":"uri","description":"URI of the last page of this result list.
